name: The Trick or Treat Experience
description:
This game is still in development. 

I had to cut back on a lot of planned features to get it released in time for Halloween 2020.

Full Disclosure: If you rush the game, you could probably finish it all in about 15 minutes. But, I encourage you to really take your time, and enjoy the experience. 

More voiceovers will be added within the next week.

Please leave comments on any bugs you run into, or gameplay improvements.

It's not just trick or treating. You can score points too!

How much candy can you collect?

This is an early-access release.

Please leave comments based on your experience.

As of 10/29, not optimized for left-haded players. (SORRY!)
